#summary Plugin changelog
#labels Featured

= 0.62 =
 * You can force the plug-in to install even if Windows 7 wasn't detected. This can be helpful if you're running Winamp in compatibility mode. No, it won't make it usable on some other OS, which doesn't support the features.

= 0.61 =
 * Fixed a bug with the thumbnail player control buttons not updating properly

= 0.6 =
 * Re-wrote the whole plug-in's memory management
 * Added option to enable / disable custom thumbnail image

= 0.6b =
 * Remade the whole configuration mechanism
 * Different album art scaling 
 * Improved compatibility with some features with eachother

= 0.54 =
 * Changed album art searching mechanism again
 * Fixed album art image scaling (it was stretching in width for some images)

= 0.53 =
 * Changed the album art searching mechanism
 * Added 'album' and 'year' to be available for selection to display on thumbnail

= 0.52 =
 * Fixed memory leak issues
 * Changed text drawing font to 'Segoe UI'
 * Removed all UI links with Winamp main window

= 0.51 =
 * Fixed a minor issue with disabled intermediate progress bar for streaming media. It was showing a tiny 1% green line.

= 0.5 =
 * <b>Album art support</b> (read main page on how to use it)
 * Different text drawing mechanism
 * Small performance tweaks (image and mp3 metadata caching)

= 0.4 =
 * <b>Added transparent (blurred) background</b> for media info display
 * Support for all major image formats: BMP, ICON, GIF, JPEG, Exif, PNG, TIFF, WMF, EMF.

= 0.31 =
 * You can display only a selected image with no text on it, by setting all lines to 'Empty'. The image and the frame won't resize in this case

= 0.3 =
 * <b>Added custom background image option</b>
 * Thumbnail and frame resizing depending on the number of lines of text selected
 * Several minor bugs / compatibility issues

= 0.2 =
 * Fixed the messagebox workaround that made Winamp not to process keyboard events
 * Fixed a bug preventing Winamp to be closed via the system menu
 * Added customizable font size

= 0.1 =
 * Initial release
